decision_conditions: The proposed removal of rooflight for ground bedroom 2 and rooflight for second floor bathroom would adversely impact the lighting condition and direct ventilation of the rooms to the detriment of future occupants' living conditions. The proposal is therefore contrary to the aim of Policy D6 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD 2013. The proposed amendments therefore cannot be treated as a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref. Planning 222211FUL dated 23/01/2023 in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for Non-Material Amendments Following a Grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow changes to approved development in relation to planning permission reference 222211FUL dated 23/01/2023 for 'Conversion of existing building (2 flats) into 3 self-contained flats; single-storey rear/side wraparound extension; replacement of windows on rear and side elevations; installation of one window to rear (main) roof slope; two rooflights to front roof slope and three to rear outrigger roof'
